summary: After attending a rave party, a teenage girl forms a bond with a strange monster as she suffers a slow chaotic mental breakdown.
cast: Carolyn Genzkow|Sina Tkotsch|Wilson Gonzalez|Arnd Klawitter|Julika Jenkins|Aram Arami|Oliver Bigalke|Michael Epp|Lynn Femme|Kim Gordon|Moritz Leu|Lucia Luciano|Vanessa Most|Nura Habib Omer|Uwe Preuss|Joe Rilla|Alexander Scheer|Til Schindler|Arnel Taci
title: Der Nachtmahr
